item.title: Hello World
item.description: Write “Hello World” in various programming language. Python print("Hello World") C #include <stdio.h> int main(){ printf("Hello World!\n"); return 0; } Difference between Python & C Although, there’s lots of difference, let’s begin with major stuff. Python is an interpreted language, which runs codes line by line. However, C is a compiled language, which means it transforms codes into machine language. Therefore, main function is required in order to inform the start of codes into the compiler.
